task.title: Run a Conversion Funnel report
task.shortdesc: Conversion Funnel reports display the percentage of visitors who progressed through a set of events in order to perform a desired action. For example, you can see how many visitors progressed from visiting your web page, through adding items to a cart, and then to purchasing an item. This report also shows the number who fell out along the way.

context.p: To run this report, select a report, such as a Pages report (Campaigns > Tracking Code > Campaign Conversion Funnel).
See Conversion Reports for a description.
